scripts.backend:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:4000,5173 | xargs kill 2>/dev/null || echo 'No servers running'
scripts.stop:backend: lsof -ti:4000 | xargs kill 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend not running'
scripts.stop:frontend: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend not running'
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:4000/health | jq . || echo 'Backend not running'
scripts.test:api: curl -s -X POST http://localhost:4000/api/auth/login -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email":"admin@kohnitaung.com","password":"password"}' | jq -r '.user.email' || echo 'API test failed'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: echo 'âœ… Dependencies installed. Run npm run start to begin development.'
